name: Sarah Robson's Pinball Wizard
description:
Billings are seriously down.  The Work's Christmas Party is in jeopardy.  Can you get the total billings up so there's enough money for this year's works Christmas Party?  Never has billing been so much fun.  Play pinball and see your billings increase as you progress from humble paralegal up to Grade A and perhaps even make Partner. 

Lady Hale's brooches are there to help you.  Hit them if you can.

Share your score, challenge your friends.  Who can be the ultimate Pinball Wizard?

https://sarahrobsonbarrister.co.uk/
